small_file_ms.description: Maximum time to highlight a small file (<100 lines)

medium_file_ms.description: Maximum time to highlight a medium file (1000 lines)

large_file_ms.description: Maximum time to highlight a large file (10000 lines)

large_file_max_mb.description: Maximum memory delta when highlighting large files

edits_per_second.description: Minimum number of edit/highlight cycles per second

many_buffers_max_memory_mb.description: Maximum memory usage for 20 concurrent buffers

memory_growth_percent.description: Maximum memory growth percentage over 60 second test

idle_cpu_percent.description: Maximum average CPU usage during idle periods

notes: These thresholds are intentionally conservative to avoid flaky tests
Actual performance may vary based on hardware and system load
Thresholds may be adjusted based on CI runner performance characteristics
